Normals¶

The normals property hold the normals computed for the point cloud. The factory enables various ways to compute those normals.

Normals Property¶

class NormalsProperty.NormalsProperty(points, normals=None)[source]¶

Attributes

Methods

Normals¶

Return points’ normals

dX¶

Return normals X coordinates

dY¶

Return normals Y coordinates

dZ¶

Return normals Z coordinates

Parameters

  • values (np.ndarray (nx3)) – the saliency values to assign

Normals Factory¶

class NormalsFactory.NormalsFactory[source]¶

Methods

static normalsComputation_in_raster(x, y, z)[source]¶

Computes the normal vectors according where each ordinate is ordered at its place as an ndarray (mxn) Usually used for computing normals in panorama images or other rasters.

According to [Zei08], the normals are computed as

\[\begin{split}\vec{v}_1 = \begin{bmatrix} dX_1\\ dY_1 \\dZ_1 \end{bmatrix} ; \qquad \vec{v}_2 = \begin{bmatrix} dX_2\\ dY_2 \\dZ_2 \end{bmatrix}\end{split}\]

with \(dX_i\) etc. the differentiation in each direction. Then,

\[\vec{N} = \frac{\vec{v}_1\times \vec{v}_2}{||\vec{v}_1\times \vec{v}_2||}\]
Parameters

  • x – x ordinates as organized in the raster

  • y – y ordinates as organized in the raster

  • z – z ordinates as organized in the raster

Returns

normals matrices for each direction

Return type

np.ndarray [\(n\times m \times 3\)]

static normalsPCA(pointset, tree=None, radius=None, k_neighbors=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Computes the normals for each point in the pointset via PCA

Parameters

  • pointset – points to compute their normals

  • tree – a KD-tree or Ball-tree to extract neighbors from. If no tree is passed, a ball-tree will be build here.

One of these should be passed

Parameters

  • radius – the radius in which the neighbors should be found

  • k_neighbors – number of neighbors

Optionals

Parameters

  • leaf_size (int) – for ball-tree construction. Default: 40

  • metric (str) – for ball-tree construction. Deafault: ‘minkowski’

Returns

normals for each point

Return type

NormalsProperty

static normals_from_file(points, normalsFileName)[source]¶
Parameters

  • points (PointSet.PointSet) – PointSet to which the normals belong to

  • normalsFileName (str) – name of file containing normal for each points

Returns

NormalsProperty of the points

Return type

NormalsProperty
